page.title: 12THE HARDWICK HAPPENINGS
page.content: The Hardwick Happenings is a magazine about Hardwick and what goes on.It tells you what clubs and what is going to happen during the month.The Hardwick Happening has advertisments.It advertises things like Cambridgeshire moters which is a car sales shop.The Happenings also has advertisment for bikes and pets for sale.The Happenings is edited by Mrs Kaye Fuller and Mrs Norah Cornwell. Interveiw with Mrs Fuller. Mrs Fuller likes the Hardwick Happenings.She likes it because it covers every aspect in the village and it brings people into the life of the village. The magazine started in November 1975.1000 copies are printed monthly and it is funded by the parish council and printed at the school.
